如何创建私有变量 ​

创建私有变量的方式大概有以下几种:

  1. 使用_
  2. 使用Symbol
  3. 使用ts
  4. 使用# !!!!
  5. 使用WeakMap

1.使用_或者__ ​

要有配套的规范约束(弱约束)下使用.

js
class Animal {
    __key = 1;
}
const a = new Animal()
console.log(a.__key) // 1 外部依旧可以获取到这个“私有变量”
class Animal {
    __key = 1;
}
const a = new Animal()
console.log(a.__key) // 1 外部依旧可以获取到这个“私有变量”

2.使用Symbol ​

ES6 引入Symbol

js
const key = Symbol('key')
class Animal {
    [key] = 1;
    m() {
        console.log(this[key]) // 1
    }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.m()

console.log(a[key]) // 1 外部依旧可以获取到这个“私有变量”
console.log(a[Object.getOwnPropertySymbols(a)[0]]) // 1 外部依旧可以获取到这个“私有变量”
const key = Symbol('key')
class Animal {
    [key] = 1;
    m() {
        console.log(this[key]) // 1
    }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.m()

console.log(a[key]) // 1 外部依旧可以获取到这个“私有变量”
console.log(a[Object.getOwnPropertySymbols(a)[0]]) // 1 外部依旧可以获取到这个“私有变量”

3.使用ts ​

使用ts的private

ts
class Animal {
  private _key = 1
  say() {
    console.log(this._key)
  }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.say()
// console.log(a._key) // tsc: Property '_key' is private and only accessible within class 'Animal'.
console.log(a["_key"]) // 1
class Animal {
  private _key = 1
  say() {
    console.log(this._key)
  }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.say()
// console.log(a._key) // tsc: Property '_key' is private and only accessible within class 'Animal'.
console.log(a["_key"]) // 1

ts中直接通过实例获取private属性，在tsc阶段会报错，但是依旧可以通过其他形式绕过，获取到定义的private属性。

tsc后的产物如下：

js
var Animal = /** @class */ (function () {
    function Animal() {
        this._key = 1;
    }
    Animal.prototype.say = function () {
        console.log(this._key);
    };
    return Animal;
}());
var a = new Animal();
a.say();
// console.log(a._key) // tsc: Property '_key' is private and only accessible within class 'Animal'.
console.log(a["_key"]);
var Animal = /** @class */ (function () {
    function Animal() {
        this._key = 1;
    }
    Animal.prototype.say = function () {
        console.log(this._key);
    };
    return Animal;
}());
var a = new Animal();
a.say();
// console.log(a._key) // tsc: Property '_key' is private and only accessible within class 'Animal'.
console.log(a["_key"]);

4.使用# 推荐!!! ​

ES2022的新特性。使用#定义私有变量，只能在class中使用

js
class Animal {
    #key = 1
    normalKey = 2
    say() {
        console.log(this.#key)
    }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.say()
// console.log(a.#say) // SyntaxError: Private field '#say' must be declared in an enclosing class
console.log(Object.getOwnPropertyNames(a)) // [ 'normalKey' ]
class Animal {
    #key = 1
    normalKey = 2
    say() {
        console.log(this.#key)
    }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.say()
// console.log(a.#say) // SyntaxError: Private field '#say' must be declared in an enclosing class
console.log(Object.getOwnPropertyNames(a)) // [ 'normalKey' ]

使用#定义私有变量的类经过Babel转译之后代码如下：

js
function _defineProperty(obj, key, value) { key = _toPropertyKey(key); if (key in obj) { Object.defineProperty(obj, key, { value: value, enumerable: true, configurable: true, writable: true }); } else { obj[key] = value; } return obj; }
function _toPropertyKey(t) { var i = _toPrimitive(t, "string"); return "symbol" == typeof i ? i : String(i); }
function _toPrimitive(t, r) { if ("object" != typeof t || !t) return t; var e = t[Symbol.toPrimitive]; if (void 0 !== e) { var i = e.call(t, r || "default"); if ("object" != typeof i) return i; throw new TypeError("@@toPrimitive must return a primitive value."); } return ("string" === r ? String : Number)(t); }
function _classPrivateFieldInitSpec(obj, privateMap, value) { _checkPrivateRedeclaration(obj, privateMap); privateMap.set(obj, value); }
function _checkPrivateRedeclaration(obj, privateCollection) { if (privateCollection.has(obj)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot initialize the same private elements twice on an object"); } }
function _classPrivateFieldGet(s, a) { return s.get(_assertClassBrand(s, a)); }
function _assertClassBrand(e, t, n) { if ("function" == typeof e ? e === t : e.has(t)) return arguments.length < 3 ? t : n; throw new TypeError("Private element is not present on this object"); }
var _key = /*#__PURE__*/new WeakMap(); // !!!!!!!!!!!!!
class Animal {
  constructor() {
    _classPrivateFieldInitSpec(this, _key, 1);
    _defineProperty(this, "normalKey", 2);
  }
  say() {
    console.log(_classPrivateFieldGet(_key, this));
  }
}
const a = new Animal();
a.say();
// console.log(a.#say) // SyntaxError: Private field '#say' must be declared in an enclosing class
console.log(Object.getOwnPropertyNames(a)); // [ 'normalKey' ]
function _defineProperty(obj, key, value) { key = _toPropertyKey(key); if (key in obj) { Object.defineProperty(obj, key, { value: value, enumerable: true, configurable: true, writable: true }); } else { obj[key] = value; } return obj; }
function _toPropertyKey(t) { var i = _toPrimitive(t, "string"); return "symbol" == typeof i ? i : String(i); }
function _toPrimitive(t, r) { if ("object" != typeof t || !t) return t; var e = t[Symbol.toPrimitive]; if (void 0 !== e) { var i = e.call(t, r || "default"); if ("object" != typeof i) return i; throw new TypeError("@@toPrimitive must return a primitive value."); } return ("string" === r ? String : Number)(t); }
function _classPrivateFieldInitSpec(obj, privateMap, value) { _checkPrivateRedeclaration(obj, privateMap); privateMap.set(obj, value); }
function _checkPrivateRedeclaration(obj, privateCollection) { if (privateCollection.has(obj)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot initialize the same private elements twice on an object"); } }
function _classPrivateFieldGet(s, a) { return s.get(_assertClassBrand(s, a)); }
function _assertClassBrand(e, t, n) { if ("function" == typeof e ? e === t : e.has(t)) return arguments.length < 3 ? t : n; throw new TypeError("Private element is not present on this object"); }
var _key = /*#__PURE__*/new WeakMap(); // !!!!!!!!!!!!!
class Animal {
  constructor() {
    _classPrivateFieldInitSpec(this, _key, 1);
    _defineProperty(this, "normalKey", 2);
  }
  say() {
    console.log(_classPrivateFieldGet(_key, this));
  }
}
const a = new Animal();
a.say();
// console.log(a.#say) // SyntaxError: Private field '#say' must be declared in an enclosing class
console.log(Object.getOwnPropertyNames(a)); // [ 'normalKey' ]

可以清楚的看到经过Babel转译后内部使用了new WeakMap()去处理的私有变量

5. 使用weakMap ​

等同于直接使用#定义，然后经过Bable转译后的产物。这写法是在是不方便！

js
const privateFields = new WeakMap()
class Animal {
    constructor() {
        privateFields.set(this, { name: 'weak' })
    }
    normalKey = 2
    say() {
        console.log(privateFields.get(this).name)
    }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.say()
console.log(Object.getOwnPropertyNames(a)) // [ 'normalKey' ]
const privateFields = new WeakMap()
class Animal {
    constructor() {
        privateFields.set(this, { name: 'weak' })
    }
    normalKey = 2
    say() {
        console.log(privateFields.get(this).name)
    }
}
const a = new Animal()
a.say()
console.log(Object.getOwnPropertyNames(a)) // [ 'normalKey' ]
